description: ç¢ - Stop hook for polishing loop control

hooks.command: bash -c 'HOOK=""; for p in "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/stop-hook.sh" "./zhuo/hooks/stop-hook.sh" "$(find . -path "*/zhuo/hooks/stop-hook.sh" 2>/dev/null | head -1)"; do [[ -f "$p" ]] && HOOK="$p" && break; done; [[ -n "$HOOK" ]] && bash "$HOOK" || exit 0'
